meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beefy.
meanings.sent1: Her beefinesses made her a strong contender in the weightlifting competition.
meanings.sent2: The boxer's beefinesses were evident in his powerful punches.
meanings.sent3: The beefinesses of the wrestler were so impressive that even the referee was in awe.
meanings.sent4: His beefinesses on the football field were like a force of nature, unstoppable and commanding.
meanings.sent5: The beefinesses of the bodybuilder were so pronounced that they seemed almost sculpted.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a muscular or robust physique.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's beefinesses allowed him to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: In the gym, his beefinesses were the envy of all the other lifters.
meanings.sent3: The beefinesses of the bodybuilder were so impressive that even the weights seemed intimidated.
meanings.sent4: Her beefinesses on the rugby field were like a shield, protecting her teammates from any opponent.
meanings.sent5: The beefinesses of the wrestler were so striking that they seemed to radiate power.
